server.name: Server Configuration
server.description: HTTP server and network settings for MoJoAssistant

SERVER_HOST.description: IP address the HTTP server binds to
SERVER_HOST.purpose: Controls which network interfaces can access the server. Use 0.0.0.0 for all interfaces, 127.0.0.1 for localhost only

SERVER_PORT.description: Port number for the HTTP server
SERVER_PORT.purpose: The port MoJoAssistant listens on for HTTP requests

CORS_ORIGINS.description: Allowed origins for CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing)
CORS_ORIGINS.purpose: Controls which domains can make browser requests to your server. Use * to allow all, or specify comma-separated URLs

ENVIRONMENT.purpose: Determines runtime behavior - development enables more verbose logging, production optimizes performance

DEBUG.purpose: When true, shows detailed error messages and stack traces. Disable in production for security

MCP_API_KEY.description: API key for MCP endpoint authentication
MCP_API_KEY.purpose: Secures MCP endpoints with a bearer token. Clients must provide this key to access MCP tools
MCP_API_KEY.how_to_generate: Use a secure random generator: openssl rand -hex 32

MCP_REQUIRE_AUTH.purpose: When true, all MCP requests must include a valid API key or OAuth token
MCP_REQUIRE_AUTH.security_note: Set to true for production deployments

MCP_PORT.purpose: Port number the MCP server listens on

MCP_HOST.purpose: Hostname or IP address for the MCP server

oauth.name: OAuth 2.1 Authentication
oauth.description: OAuth 2.1 settings for Claude Desktop and other OAuth clients

OAUTH_ENABLED.purpose: Turns on OAuth 2.1 support for Claude Desktop and other OAuth-compatible clients

OAUTH_AUDIENCE.purpose: The intended audience for OAuth tokens - typically your server's public URL

OAUTH_ISSUER.purpose: The authorization server that issues tokens. Leave empty if running your own authorization server

OAUTH_JWKS_URI.description: JSON Web Key Set URI for token verification
OAUTH_JWKS_URI.purpose: URL to fetch public keys for verifying JWT signatures. Only needed for external OAuth providers

OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_SERVER_ENABLED.purpose: When true, MoJoAssistant acts as its own OAuth server and issues tokens to clients like Claude Desktop

OAUTH_AUTO_APPROVE.purpose: Skip manual consent screen - useful for personal deployments where you trust all clients

OAUTH_API_KEY_MODE.purpose: When true, clients can use the MCP_API_KEY directly as a Bearer token instead of OAuth flow

OAUTH_PUBLIC_CLIENT_ENABLED.purpose: Enable Dynamic Client Registration (DCR) - clients can register themselves without pre-configured credentials

OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_CODE_TTL.purpose: How long authorization codes remain valid before expiring

OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_TTL.purpose: How long access tokens remain valid before expiring

OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_TTL.purpose: How long refresh tokens remain valid before expiring

OAUTH_VERIFY_SIGNATURE.purpose: When true, validates that tokens were signed by a trusted authority. Disable for opaque tokens from your own server

OAUTH_VERIFY_AUDIENCE.purpose: When true, ensures tokens are intended for this server (audience matches OAUTH_AUDIENCE)

OAUTH_VERIFY_ISSUER.purpose: When true, ensures tokens came from the expected authorization server

OAUTH_ALGORITHM.purpose: Cryptographic algorithm used to sign/verify tokens

OAUTH_TOKEN_CACHE_TTL.purpose: How long to cache token validation results to reduce repeated verifications

OAUTH_SUPPORTED_SCOPES.purpose: Comma-separated list of permission scopes clients can request

OAUTH_REQUIRED_SCOPE.purpose: All requests must have at least this scope to be authorized

llm_providers.name: LLM Provider Configuration
llm_providers.description: API keys and settings for cloud AI providers

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for GPT models
OPENAI_API_KEY.purpose: Enables access to OpenAI's GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and other models
OPENAI_API_KEY.how_to_get: Sign up at https://platform.openai.com and create an API key at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY.cost: Pay-per-use pricing based on tokens consumed

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic API key for Claude models
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.purpose: Enables access to Claude 3 (Opus, Sonnet, Haiku) and other Anthropic models
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.how_to_get: Sign up at https://console.anthropic.com and create an API key at https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.cost: Pay-per-use pricing based on tokens consumed

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google API key for Gemini models and Search
GOOGLE_API_KEY.purpose: Enables access to Google Gemini models and Google Custom Search API
GOOGLE_API_KEY.cost: Gemini has a free tier; Search API is pay-per-query

OPEN_ROUTER_KEY.description: OpenRouter API key for multi-model access
OPEN_ROUTER_KEY.purpose: Access multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, Google, etc.) through a single unified API
OPEN_ROUTER_KEY.how_to_get: Sign up at https://openrouter.ai and create an API key at https://openrouter.ai/keys
OPEN_ROUTER_KEY.cost: Pay-per-use with competitive pricing across models

HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN.purpose: Download models from HuggingFace, access gated models, and use HuggingFace API
HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN.how_to_get: Sign up at https://huggingface.co and create a token at https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens

DEFAULT_LLM_PROVIDER.purpose: Which provider MoJoAssistant uses when multiple API keys are configured

LOCAL_MODEL_PATH.description: Path to local LLM model files
LOCAL_MODEL_PATH.purpose: Directory where local model files (.gguf, safetensors, etc.) are stored

search.name: Search Configuration
search.description: Web search and knowledge retrieval settings

SEARCH_ENABLED.purpose: When true, MoJoAssistant can search the web for information

GOOGLE_SEARCH_ENGINE_ID.purpose: Identifies your custom search engine for Google Search API queries
GOOGLE_SEARCH_ENGINE_ID.how_to_get: Create a custom search engine at https://programmablesearchengine.google.com/

memory.name: Memory and Knowledge System
memory.description: Vector storage, embeddings, and knowledge management

EMBEDDING_MODEL.purpose: The model used to convert text into vector embeddings for similarity search

MULTI_MODEL_ENABLED.purpose: When true, allows using different embedding models for different purposes

VECTOR_STORE.purpose: Which vector database to use for storing embeddings

MEMORY_PATH.purpose: Where MoJoAssistant stores conversation memories, context, and episodic information

KNOWLEDGE_PATH.purpose: Where MoJoAssistant stores long-term knowledge, facts, and indexed documents

MAX_CONTEXT_ITEMS.purpose: How many relevant memory items to include when answering questions

EMBEDDING_CACHE_TTL.purpose: How long to cache computed embeddings before recomputing

logging.name: Logging and Debugging
logging.description: Log output, verbosity, and debugging options

LOG_LEVEL.purpose: Controls how much information is logged

LOG_FORMAT.purpose: Python logging format template for log messages

LOG_FILE.purpose: Where to write log messages to disk. Leave empty to disable file logging

LOG_CONSOLE.purpose: When true, logs are printed to stdout/stderr in addition to any log file

ENABLE_DREAMING.purpose: When true, MoJoAssistant runs background processes to consolidate memories and generate insights

ENABLE_SCHEDULER.purpose: When true, enables scheduled tasks and background job processing

ENABLE_OPENCODE.purpose: When true, enables GitHub code workflow features and repository management

github.name: GitHub Integration
github.description: GitHub API access and repository management

GITHUB_TOKEN.purpose: Enables MoJoAssistant to access GitHub repositories, create issues, manage pull requests, etc.
GITHUB_TOKEN.how_to_get: Create at https://github.com/settings/tokens - select 'repo' scope for full access or 'public_repo' for public repos only

opencode.name: OpenCode Manager Configuration
opencode.description: Configuration for OpenCode MCP tool server

GLOBAL_MCP_TOOL_PORT.description: Fixed port for OpenCode MCP tool server
GLOBAL_MCP_TOOL_PORT.purpose: Port number for the global MCP tool server (required for cloudflared tunnels)

GLOBAL_MCP_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Bearer token for OpenCode MCP tool authentication
GLOBAL_MCP_BEARER_TOKEN.purpose: Secures the global MCP tool server with a bearer token
GLOBAL_MCP_BEARER_TOKEN.how_to_generate: Use a secure random generator: openssl rand -hex 32

OPENCODE_MCP_TOOL_PATH.purpose: Local filesystem path where the opencode-mcp-tool repository is located

local_only.name: Local AI Only
local_only.description: Run MoJoAssistant with local models only - completely private, no internet required

cloud_ai.name: Cloud AI
cloud_ai.description: Use cloud LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, OpenRouter) for powerful AI capabilities
required_variables: One of: OPENAI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, GOOGLE_API_KEY, OPEN_ROUTER_KEY

hybrid.name: Local + Cloud
hybrid.description: Use both local and cloud models - local for privacy-sensitive tasks, cloud for complex reasoning
required_variables: One of: OPENAI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, GOOGLE_API_KEY, OPEN_ROUTER_KEY

github_integration.name: GitHub Integration
github_integration.description: Enable GitHub repository management, code workflows, and OpenCode features

claude_desktop.name: Claude Desktop Integration
claude_desktop.description: Configure OAuth 2.1 for Claude Desktop app connectivity
